name: We Missed Party
description:
Community game for the 48-hour Wholesome Games Jam 2022. We Missed Party is a simple game of inviting everyone in your community to your magical party. The more the merrier!

Team Name: ........ ........ ........ (disconnected)

Team Members: @zesky (code), @z_z (art), @Lemoney (code/art)

GitHub Repository: https://github.com/zeskysee/we-missed-party

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Analog Stick - Movement

Space / X Button or B Button - Interact 

, or L1 - Volume Down

. or R1 - Volume Up

~ or Start - Skip Cutscene
